content.detailedDescription: Went to get a few drinks from the shop down the road, on my way back i turned the corner of the road and i could see a very bright orange light in the distance coming from the direction of the local southend airport, my first thought was police helicopter, but they have a white lights so i walked on about 25-- 30 meters as i was walking this orange light just got bigger and bigger and bigger, i stopped walking and hid behind a telegraph pole in the street and just watched in amazement at what was happening to me. this huge orange ball swerved to the left and flew down our road at about 300 ft high, it was bubbling and fiery and pulsing orange, i have never seen fire like this, this was a special kind of fire that i have never seen before, a bit like lather, then flew down in a straight line and did not roll but moved forward like a steady ball, as it went over my head i cupped my hands together to get a better listen but this thing was totally silent as it passed i could see that it was just as round from behind as it was from the front and the underside, this experience has had a profound effect on me for the good, yesterday i told my partner that i was proud to be a human, that is the first time i have ever said that and i have never heard anybody else utter those words. just in my area alone there have been about 30 sightings on all different days and at different times by all different people
content.summary: Orange ball the size of a house, 300ft over road glowing and pulsing orange fire

content.detailedDescription:
my friends and i were standing on the dock at arrowhead lake looking at the moon, there was no stars in the sky, when i noticed a light in the sky that i thought was a star until we noticed that it was moving at us, at this point we heard that it was a jet flying low and fast, at this point my friend asked me, "well, what i want to know is, what is this other light" as we saw the "fireball like light" at this point the fast low flying jet banked and headed at the fireball. turning back to watch the fire ball we watched it (the best way to describe it) was to say it was shaking in the sky in an up and down motion, then with what would have to be really really fast it moved to the west then back at us then the shaking thing again but this time it was back and forth not up and down, at this point it started going in all different directions, 90 degree angles, stop and go (instant stop and go) and quickly dissapeared into the tree line. this is the point where we saw another jet (maybe the same one) flying in the same spot as the one before. it made it seem like they (the jets) were looking for that fireball light.
      i just wanted to say that my dad was a pilot and i love flying and all airplanes, and in my 38 years i've never seen anything move like that, the inertia would have killed the pilot.
    the whole thing gave me a weird creepy feeling, the chasing jets, starless evening, and the fact is, if the jets were privet then they should be in a bit of trouble for flying so low, made me think that they were military jets, it was creepy.
content.summary: Fire ball like light

content.detailedDescription:
Today, while enjoying a biscuit's baseball game, i stepped outside to take a smoke. as i was standing there, i noticed a large collection of flying objects i cannot explain fly in formation over the river. as i got closer to see what exactly it was, one of the spaceships, which looked remarkably like an egg, landed in front of me. to my amazement, i witnessed a large, bean tribal chief step out and engage me in conversation. he said that he, chief greasetoe, was the commander of this particular air calvary force, and that this is his warning to me and all of the rest of humanity. he said that our world will succumb to a bean invasion shortly after august of 2012. as he and his spaceship then left, his craft hit the brown note and i defecated upon myself in a rather green and uncolorful brown poo matter. i think that this is the start.
please contact me for any advice or help. my cell is 334-430-7948
content.summary: Small invasion force spotted over montgomery biscuit's stadium

content.detailedDescription: It was the evening of the 21st amy 2010 in stroud, gloucestershire, england.  as it was a balmy warm evening we had a bbq and stayed outside in the garden.  around 10;30pm the missus went to bed as she had work in the morning while i stayed out to ���look at the stars���.  the sky was clear and lit by a half moon.  at approximately 11-15pm i noticed an extremely bright light due west of stroud. i ran inside and told the missus to look out of the bedroom window which she did and commented on the bright light as ���being strange���. i went back out for a closer look. as the object approached i could see that the single bright light was actually 2 (like car headlights). to my utter amazement the object passed overhead and it was a large black triangle/delta wing shape. it was flying slow and low (1000ft or so) and was easily the size of a jumbo jet, if not bigger. i could clearly see the underside of the ���vehicle��� from an oblique angle which was entirely black save for a large glowing circular light in the centre with 4 adjacent smaller lights surrounding it. the large central light appeared to be like a ���protruding blister��� but was not entirely glowing but made up of many alternating bright and dark strips or bands. there were also red and green lights on the rear corners of the vehicle with a row of small lights along the rear. i watched the object travel due east until it disappeared over the horizon. there was some associated noise like a jet engine but it was more ���hummy���. i took photos with my phone but they don���t show anything apart from black!  nothing like what i saw, which totally gobsmacked me. i did sketch the object straight after the sighting though.  as it was a warm friday night there must have been other people who saw the ���vehicle���. i heard neighbours up the street arguing about what they saw.  i skywatch quite a bit and have never seen anything like it.
content.summary: Black triangular craft over stroud, gloucestershire, england

content.detailedDescription: I am reporting this event on behalf of the person you took the photo. it is hard to tell what the shape is, but it appears that it is not an airplane and based on the description from the owner of the picture, it was not an airplane. also, it seems like there have been other reports of a similar object in wyoming. it is possible that the object is a uav of some sort, but it is not one that is public knowledge? hopefully the shape can be identified. it was reported as silver in color and that is what appears to be the case in the photos. the object has been seen more than one time in the same area.
content.summary: Silver boomerang shape - possible drone?

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: Three of my friends and i was flying a kite at night with a pen light when from orions belt came two discs dancing towards our kite, spun around our kite, light went off and they stopped and went right back to orions belt at light speed. i watched light disapate for miles and miles in miliseconds. was i spooked? no. because, i myself, have been subjected to the grays since birth. i changed a lot of their behaviors on humans and allowed them to read my mind as they allowed me to read theirs. many encounters fourth kind. a couple of implants i quit taking them out because the always return to implant others. i changed their diet their too smart for any other supperior beings as demons,angels, or even god. they are not out there they are imbedded in the waters, swamps, grassy marshes, and even in the ground. they are and have been watching and observing and changing dna replicating humanoid and other beings from other planets. soon the answers and truths will be fulfilled. human beings are forever changing and the knowledge will allow mankind to keep up with their race. each of the grays are exact duplicates of theirself. now we have given up our secrets, cells, and our government has tried to keep them at bay except for the people that see, hear, smell, touch, a gray. if you dont understand you wont, if you do dont fear. they really/really want whats best and want us to grow to understand. at first it might have seemed that they were radical, we were in their scope since the first days of man.Im not visited as much any more.Maps 'wepons,motherships desending,was instilled in my mind ;i remember everything.....After a few to many abductions.I was wide eyed,but the govn.Was hot on us,men in black were everywhere;till the hubble;scope was turned on me. i guess after they [greys] knew i was not being intransed to forget and being hot zone,they moved on.I do know they will retern..I will be ready....Will you.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Me and friend went to the local levy to drink a 12 pack of beer and

content.detailedDescription: Watching for shooting stars and saw a pin point object traveling north to south. object approached two parallel air liners flying two miles apart. object increased in brightness until it appeared to be as large as a nickle. it moved within three miles of jets then disappeared. light was very intense.
content.summary: Star like object at high altitude

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving west on route 52, approaching pine bush, ny.  i noticed "something strange" in the sky, and snapped the attached photo.  i don't remember seeing the lights move or blink or anything. 

fast forward to late april 2010...Looking through my pictures on my cellphone, i found the pic i had taken and had completely forgotten about.  i do not believe there is any "missing time" but can't be sure, as i have no memory other than a vague memory of seeing something strange and taking a pic, then not thinking about it until i found the pic on my phone in april...

i posted the photo to a local ufo yahoo group.  one of the members lightened it, and i am attaching that photo as well.  i cannot explain.

thank you.
content.summary: Lights in formation in sky

content.detailedDescription:
On may 19th, 2010 while hanging my laundry outside i noticed a silver, solid object hovering in the sky towards the north. i was a perfectly claer day and i watched it for a while before it dawned upon me that this wasn't anything i could explain so i ran for my camera. when i returned it took me a few seconds if not a minute to find it again (i thought it would be gone) but i managed to get around twenty shots of it. the pictures i took were with my slr camera with a 300mm optical zoom and they were still somewhat fuzzy, but there was an object there and at one point it looked like there were two objects!
on may 20th after having told some of my friends of the previous days adventure, i was fixing my bike in my backyard it was another perfectly clear day but i was not really considering that i would see anything again but there it was again this time to the west i had my camera ready on my desk so i ran over my son to get it. this time the object was much close and i got some images which clealy show defined shape or shapes because it kept changing shapes. this tiome the object moved faster and went behind my house whee i lost it.
around a 1/2 hour later i looked towards the east and since it was a fairly shiney (sticking out like a sore thumb) object i easily saw it.
so i grabbed my camera once again, this time the object was much farther away and the pictures were more grainy but the object clearly changed shapoed several times before it started to move eratically.
this is when the object broke into 2 pieces and shot out in 2 different directions and disappeared!
sounds nuts but i have the pictures, even of it breaking apart into 2 pieces!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Unknown
content.shape: Cone,   Disc,   Egg,   Saturn-like,   Sphere,   Teardrop
content.summary: Solid, silver object seen 2 day in a row from backyard in the daytime.

content.detailedDescription:
We were coming back home from concord.  we were shopping in cost plus world market at 8:38pm.  my daughter was driving in the freeway, and that space was surrounded with buildings, when i noticed a very sharp lights of an aircraft...Was very big for a normal aircraft...I did not think was unsual, just cough my attention (i used to be a civil pilot in 1978), when we were close... i said: what is that!  at first i thought was an helicopter a big one...But was no peculiar sound, and was stationary in the air, the shape was rectangular and big.  what make me think that this was and unusual aircraft, was that when we were approaching has light all over the edges of the bottom part of the object and a red flash light on the end.  i told my daughter did you see that?... what, what?...She could not see anything because she was concentrated on the freeway driving, and we could not stop. 
i am not updated in aviation, i never in my live saw any ufo, just one day flying close to the beach in my country, i notices big round foot on the sand , 3 of them in a perfect triangle shape, and my co-pilot friend pilot also saw it...Is the nearest sighting i had experienced.  we were at 1500 feets hight.
what was that a new type of helicopter? we are surrounded of airdromes, is a too public space.  i do not know... was unusual to me... i had to know!  when i came back home i start to check in the internet, and immediately pop up this link:

http://www.Examiner.Com/x-2363-ufo-examiner~y2010m3d26-rectangle-ufo-hovers-low-over-i15-near-riverside-ca.

was like i was telling the same story!  too strange!
content.summary: Rectangle aircraft or ufo...?

content.detailedDescription:
I was riding in the rear driver's side seat of my dad's car on the way home from eating dinner out at a local tex-mex restaurant.  my dad, his girlfriend, her 4 year-old son, and myself were in the car.  there was a beautiful sunset setting up in the west, so our eyes were on a grouping of reddish clouds in that direction.  the skies were mostly clear, including the area just above the reddish clouds on the western horizon.  

as we drove north on 183a (changing back to 183), i kept my eyes on a large, cloud-like object just above the reddish clouds that were illuminated by the sunset.  i figured that it was probably a stray cloud or an afterburner trail (a very short, dense one), but there seemed to be something strange about it, so i kept track of it as i kept looking out the window.  after over 10 minutes of watching it from the car, i realized that the object could not be an afterburner trail, since it hadn't changed shape or faded at all, and was far too opaque.  at this point i told my dad and his girlfriend to take a look in that direction.  my dad was driving, so he only got a brief look at it.. but his gf got a good, long look at it.  it appeared to be quite large and distant, but at this point we were both fairly certain that it wasn't a cloud.  there was a definite contrast between the shade of grey in this object and the clouds around it.  

as we drew closer to home, the object was still there.. hanging in the sky, completely static as far as we could tell.  the object appeared to be somewhat ovular or disc-like, but the actual shape was difficult to tell because of how distant it was.  we had to stop at a traffic light, and the trees near the road partially blocked our view of that horizon, obscuring the part of the sky where the object had been.  once the light turned back to green and we cleared the obstructing trees, the object was gone.  not moved, gone.  at this point there was no doubt in my mind that this was a craft, and one that had either moved an incredible distance in a matter of less than a minute, or gone invisible.  my dad's gf agreed that it could not have been a cloud or any other natural occurrence.

once we got home and out of the car, i started looking back up at the sky to see if i could spot the object again.  when we were just about ready to go into the house, i saw an extremely bright, pulsating white light in the western/southwestern sky.  i pointed it out to my father and his girlfriend, and they both confirmed what i was seeing.  it was as bright as a star (or brighter), and stayed stationary for at least 20-30 seconds.  then it moved horizontally at a high rate of speed into a cloud, which obscured it from our view.  we had an excited conversation about it, and went back inside the house.  none of us have a good pair of binoculars or a telescope, so we weren't able to get a close look at either craft (or was it the same one?).
content.summary: 2 ufos (or same one twice) sighted by 3 witnesses near austin, tx

content.detailedDescription:
Around the time of the incident, i was outside in the front yard looking at different objects with my new meade telescope i had gotten for christmas(i was 15 at the time). i had been outside for roughly an hour, just looking at random stars after i finished my routine look at jupiter. as i was looking for something to point my telescope at, i noticed what looked to be an airplane, flying away off to the south. it was brown in color, which i originally attributed to the red and green lights on the aircraft mixing over the long distance. the only reason i noticed it was because it was headed in the direction on my next target, a plain looking star that i thought at the time might be the andromeda galaxy (it wasn't). as it neared the point where it would have crossed the sight of the star, it seemed to flicker out of existence. my father was in the air force. i've lived near several air force bases and on two others, tocoma afb in washington and charleston afb (it may have a different name but it was in charleston) in south carolina. i know a few things about air craft. i know their capabilities. i have never seen something "flicker" like this did. it was like a fire being extinguished rather than a light going out. i was very confused at this point. as i stared where it disappeared, however, it reappeared right above the same star with the same flicker it had left with. now i was nervous. i felt the tingle usually associated with fear. i had the very powerful sensation that this thing knew i was there, and knew i was watching it. the object stayed motionless in this position for probably 2 or 3 seconds, and then did something i have never seen before with any airbourne object. it jumped across over half the sky at about a 50-60 degree angle in a split second, then just disappeared. while it was moving it blinked. it seemed to me that rather than actually moving, it was teleporting or jumping from point to point, but i wouldn't know for sure. if an aircraft were to move that fast i believe the friction from the atmosphere would incinerate it.
i ran back into the house to tell my parents and they both proceeded to be extremely skeptical, yet start telling stories of their own weird sightings. before this event i was very skeptical of ufos, at least extra terrestial ones. that night, when i went to bed, i kept going over and over it in my mind, and slowly became terrified. the most unnerving thing was feeling like the thing had marked me as someone who knew that it had been there, someone who had seen it. i have always been an airospace lover, and know many things about air craft and space craft through my own research. i am a younger individual but i do not believe that restricts my ability to use rational thought. what i saw was real. it was not a man made air craft, at least no conventional aircraft. it was not a meteorite. not a satellite. not the iss. what infuriates me is how, at least from a distance, it had every appearance of a passenger jet slowly moving across the sky. how do i know i havn't glimpsed dozens of these craft, only to look away thinking nothing of it?
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flying like plane, disappeared, reappeared, cleared half the sky in a second

content.detailedDescription:
It was a overcast day at the beach at anna maria island, fl, when beatiful sun rays came through the cloud formations.  i took pictures with my canon powershot sd600.  as usual i load all my pictures on my computer which plays as my screen saver.  i kept looking at these two pictures that were in sequence and was bothered by the shapes in the clouds.  

i finally brought them into adobe photoshop and enhanced them, and find it strange what appears.  i am not sure if they are ufos but they certainly are not birds.

what was unusual all other pictures outside of these frames were not blurry, only these pictures came out blurry.

the third picture looks like something is either coming out of or going into the water - uso? not sure.

let me know what you think.

thank you,
marilyn
content.summary: Did not see with eyes but viewed these in my photos.

content.detailedDescription: I was elk hunting completely clean and sober. i was sitting on this huge flat rock looking down to the oak brush all of a sudden i could not breathe! after a second or two  ilooked up over my right shoulder and saw a boomerang like thing.And it stopped the second i looked up i watched it for certain amount of time. the next thing i know it zoomed of at an incrediable speed.It went down to the oak brush and saw it hit the leaves and dissapear.I could finally breathe! i stood up and just walked away like nothing when hunting season was over i never even thought about it.  a few mounths ago i remembered it and talked about it i was heckled and had my family turned away from me. i finally got my first pc and reported it
content.summary: I saw a boomerang shaped object it  made all the oxyigen away i couldnbreathet

content.detailedDescription: Obviously this object was either very high or in some sort of camo mode or painted gray. i am a former usaf member. i am the son of a test pilot. i have had numerous conversations about ufo with friends. i have never, never seen anything in the sky that was not explainable until today. at approx 300 pm. i went to see if my electronic neighborhood pool keys (the pool opened today) worked. they did. i went back home got my climbing shades (julbo, polarized, i use these sahdes for intense light environments) and towel and went back. temp today was about 85 f. after i killed a bee around 335 pm the sun began off and on behind the clouds at about 600-1000 ft alt. i got situated looking slightly to the west to get the max exposure, so the sun was at my 11 o'clock and the sun was about 65 degrees up (thinking like a azmuth or compass) the kids jumping in the pool and clouds shifting caused me to open my eyes every few minutes. at approx 340pm i opened my eyes and saw blue sky, and for a second (just a second!) i opened my eyes to see an usual flash of light in the shape of an arc at almost the same angle as the sun just to the right of the sun. there were jets on approach moving (leaving contrast trails) west to east i assume on aproach or leaving the atl flight area. the flash of light caught my eye and i blinked after seeing this, to notice something very faint in the shape of a fuzzy square. i took this as meaning it was very high in the atmosphere or it was trying to hide. as i followed the object there was no sound over the kids and pool noise, no trail, no wings, nothing ordinary. it looked like a square but may have had a nose. what was interesting about this was that when i removed my shades it was gone completely. there were so many people there and it was quietly moving north with not a notice by anyone probably becuase this was not an easy thing to see. you'd have to have looked right at it to see it. i lost it for a few seconds while i removed my shades, but then found it again moving rapidly north.  i lifted my shades several times in disbelief as i followed it; making it go away and bringing it back. this was scientifically similar to removing the light wave length in the blue spectrum. essentially cutting out some of the refracted blue light background from the sky. i can't say how big this was,looking at my ruler here on the table... it was about 6-8mm long (again from my point of view) and 3 to 4mm wide. it was gray and fuzzy but had distinct edges, thinking back especislly the rear of the object seemed more defined , a clear straight edge. it moved smoothly north with no trails, nothing. i followed it for what seemed like 1 to 2 minutes to the north until about 30 degrees on the horizon. after i lost the object i jumped up and ran home to document all that happened. i am amazed that i saw this object. i will not say that it was something from another planet, or what, but definately not anything i have ever seen. report worthy.
content.summary: Gray object reflected light only seen under polarized lens

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on my back deck facing s/e and saw a rapidly moving series of 3 white dashes(one appear, then replaced by another further to the west) moving east to west in a straight line parallel to the ground. approx 25 degrees above ground, vanished when it went behind a tree.  my son was with me and missed this part.  when i exclaimed "wtf" he turned and as i was explaining what i saw the dashes appeared again more from a westerly point than where it disappeared, then moved rapidly again in the opposite direction for two dashes.  it disappeared in an unobstructed part of the sky. the second appearance was closer to us and appeared higher in the sky(50 degrees from ground). both times it traveled in a straight line parallel to the ground.  

sky was partial clouds but no ground fog. no sound. i live in a rural area and am used to lighting bugs etc.  this was not a natural phenomenon. total time from beginning to end of sighting was aprox 1 minute. each flash was about one second long, covering maybe 5 degrees of arc at a time. the flashes appeared like dashes in the sky that rapidly appeared then disappeared:  - - - before the next one. too fast for a plane and too low. i am used to seeing planes in the sky around here.
content.summary: Series of short white dashes

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a photograph of a cow in the arizona desert (oak wells, az).  i did not see the ufo at the time, nor did my husband.  photo is time-stamped 11:51 am.  the ufo does not appear in the photos immediately before or after (as it would have had it been an airplane).  i only noticed the ufo after i got home and downloaded the photographs to my computer.
content.summary: Ufo showed up in digital photo

content.detailedDescription:
Written on behalf on witness-

sighting started at approximately 11:00pm and lasted off and on for 40 minutes.
multiple objects were darting around at high speedand performing maneuvers.
a couple of the younger members of the family were quite scared.
content.summary: Multiple objects making manoeuvres

content.detailedDescription: Last night i slept outside as i often do when weather permits.  i awoke about midnight and remained awake a couple hours according to an inside clock when i went inside briefly.  as a star gazer and photographer i am familiar with the rate/speed that meteors  usually travel. this night i saw two meteors, but the sighting i am describing was different.  as i was looking up nearly overhead (~ 80 degrees up) but slightly to the east a bright "twinkle" caught my eye. i can only estimate the time to be around 02:00 am.  in less than a second what appeared to be an extremely fast double streak appeared from the point of the "twinkle".  from my perspective it appeared to travel about an inch, moved northward, and lasted less than a second before disappearing. i was impressed by the speed.  i am very familiar with movement of satellites and have photographed many iridium satellite flares as well as others.  whatever this was appeared to be very high, but moving too fast to be a satellite or meteor.
content.summary: Double streak moves faster than meteor

content.detailedDescription:
One of my many ufos captured in the infrared spectrum, this one being unique as the filter used allowed spectrum shift on my sony handycam. the footage here shows the ufo reflecting infrared light but not visible.

[cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Spectrum shifting ufo

content.detailedDescription: Looked out of back window, saw a flash, it came back, golden with a black center. it was gone. then i thought i went to the front of the house, looked out and there it was again. this time golden, with black, i saw windows in it, then it went behind trees. i had been up walking the floors. having hard time sleeping.The object moved fast behind trees.I knew it was over, so i went to bed.
content.summary: Looked out back window, saw a flash, it came back,gold. with a black cylinderl. looked out front then it waw there.

content.detailedDescription:
Upon returning home after seeing a movie, my husband and i observed a very bright light to the west in the night sky that looked as if it were 'twinkling'. i am interested in astronomy and know a little about stars and planets. this was no star or planet that i know of and seemed unusual because it was so very bright. it was moving very slowly to the west northwest. lights were much brighter than those on a any aircraft that i know of.  it was maybe 25 degrees above the horizon, although it's hard to tell because there are a lot of trees in our area.

we went inside and i grabbed my binoculars and we both went back outside to take a look.  through binoculars flashing green, amber and red lights were noted. no shape could be seen, only the lights were visible. there was no sound but that could have been because of distance. it appeared that the lights were changing color, and maybe changing configuration although it was difficult to tell because of the distance. we both watched for a while, then my husband went in the house and i stayed and watched until it disappeared behind the tree line.
content.summary: Very bright amber, green and red lights in the night sky moving slowly to the west northwest.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the front porch, facing south.  visible prominate objects were spica and saturn in a cloudless sky.  i had observed an aircraft at high altitude with a northerly heading at an elevation in line with saturn.

i started to turn away, to the east, and a bright flash caught my attention, midway and above the instesect between spica and saturn.  

as i turned to see what it was it increased in brilliance by a factor of 2 to 3 times.  it extinquished very rapidly and i observed an object, point of light, moving away on a northerly trajectory.  

i observed it for ~ 45 seconds until it was lost in the night sky nearly overhead.  it had overtaken the aircraft, lower altitude, well before it disappeared.
content.summary: Sudden flash(s) with object noticed moving away rapidly

content.detailedDescription:
Was driving down the m42  around 1.25pm uk time and over a bridge there was the best way to describe it was a bright blue crescent shaped moon with a bit below like a teardrop or tube at first i thought it was a ballon but as i drove closer it was not moving its was in a fixed hover or moved very little. it was hovering over a bridge and must have been seen by other people 

it was brilliant blue in colour i first seen it from about 1000 yards away hovering about 25-35ft above a small motorway bridge between junction 3 and 3a and it did not seem to move it looked like a hard object and sharp i.E it wasn't flapping or rounded almost looked 2d

it was hard to look at it because of been on a busy motorway but i can't understand it i mean if it was a ballon it should go up or flap about but didn't move or appear to wasn't very big probs about 4ft tall in all and 1.5-2ft feet wide

after going to the airport i came back the same way and there was no sign of it must have been around 20-30mins later which throws out the idea of it been for advertising

i really don't have any ideas to what it could be love to hear if anyone does or seen it too please have a look at the pic its only rough but u get the idea.
content.summary: Blue crescent shaped moon with bit below m42 west mids

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i pulled into dewberry church parking lot we had just came from the package store and stopped to have a beer.We saw the lights in the sky and isaid to my friend look there is bud flying over his house he had just began taking flying lessons. my friend said that's not an aeroplane.I could tell the fear in his voice ilookedup again and the object was much closer the object was close enough to se a row of windows all down the side it was making no noise and had slowed to a speed hardly faster than a man could run. the object appeared to be about three feet long from my perspective i was curious but not curious enough to get out of the car.The object continued moving across the field then disappeared behind the tree line about five hundred feet away after the object disappeared we sat very still and quiet for a couple of minutes then left the area very quickly.
content.summary: Ufo was high then it came down very rapidlycame to a slow crawl then dissappeared behind tree line

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting in parking lot of my apartment complex for my roommate to pick me up. i was looking south at night sky and noticed two faint but white objects crossing my line of vision from my right to my left, heading from nw to sw direction. one seem to be following the other, just could make out what looked to be round almost ball like.  at first i thought maybe they were parachutes, but why would they be out that time of night and so near to the airbase.  also, i noticed that the were traveling in the direction i noted and that they seem to stay at same altitude and traveling at same speed.  i was not sure what speed they were going, not sure what size they were, since i could just make them out in the sky.  no lights, very silent, i was listening for engine sounds from the objects and did not hear any type of sounds from the objects. no idea what the objects were and not sure what altitude they were at. kept objects in sight for about 50 seconds to a minute. i was surprise to see the objects and noted that they were traveling in area and direction that most aircraft in this area do not traverse. i was very curious about the objects and wonder if they were some type of military hardware, or were they truly alien crafts. they disappeared from sight due to trees and building being in the way of the direction they were traveling.
content.summary: Two objects in sky going nw to se

content.detailedDescription:
My friends and i were camping in anza valley, near thomas mountain.  we had a camp fire on a ridge and were enjoying the night.  after most of my friends went to sleep, my friend and i decided to take a hike at about 3am.  we walked approx. 100 yds up to the top of a hill that provides a 360 degree view of the valley to the north  and thomas mountain at south by south west.  upon reaching the top of the hill near our camp site, which was actually just a cut off of the dirt road south of lake hemet off of the 74, we spent a few minutes at the top, enjoying the view and then decided not to continue over the hill since we would lose sight of our camp fire.  once we started heading back, what appeared to be a large, bright, and consistently lit shooting star pierced the sky to the south, somewhere over thomas mountain.  about three quarter of the way through the object's flight, the object sharply changed direction downward from it's 45 degree decent to a straight down dive.  it then disappeared behind the mountain without a flash or sound.  my friend and i immediately took notice of the puzzling turn of the meteor and verified that we both saw a projectile turn 45 degrees in the sky without losing any velocity, or having any curve at all.  this was also clear through the tail that followed the object.  the tail of object followed it perfectly creating a 45 degree angled shape in the sky, before dissipating.  also, the trail was extremely straight and clean.  there was no spreading of light or particles as it entered the atmosphere. we were both so scared by what we saw, that we ran full speed back to our campsite and didn't speak of it till later the next day. 

 what i saw was physically impossible.  no physical object can move at that speed, make no noise, and be able to turn so sharply without slowing down or even curving into the turn.  it was similar to watching a neon light ignite from top to bottom, speedily filling a bent tube.  very eerie.  what we saw was real, it came from out of the atmosphere, and it behaved as if under intelligent control.  we considered that the object may have exploded and split off in a downward direction as meteors may do, but decided that the conciseness of the turn and the fact that the object changed in no way other than direction, there's no way it was a meteor.  

i know what i saw, and now i'm a believer.
content.summary: Bright, high velocity light, with bright long tail, that turned 45 degrees downward at full speed

content.detailedDescription: I read the report out of great britain today, and felt compelled to report what i saw last night. i was going to report anyway, but i wanted to read the last 20 reports to mufon first. i was looking for anything that matched what i had seen. witness in england said sighting was at 2:30 a.M. that would be 9:30 p.M. here in the usa. i do alot of star gazing on clear nights, and felt last night would be eventful. i looked out a ne facing window and saw a yellowish white star like object movine horizontally going from s to n. thought it is probably a satelite. also thought maybe it's iss or space shuttle. however, upon going outside with my binoculars in hand, i then witnessed at least 10 other such objects within the next 1/2 hour! the first few went e to n. then one came from the w going n. i then observed one coming from the se which merged with what i thought were just stars! it was that one that convinced me that what i was seeing was not ordinary. after it merged it became stationary. it seemed like there were alot of stars in arc formations as well. like i say i look up alot at night, and i'm familiar with star positions. i did'nt see anything that resembled a missile like you did. but i found your report to be very close to what i saw, and not that much time diffence either. this may have been going on at 9:30 p.M. here, 2:30 a.M. your time, but i began watching the sky 1 hour later. close enough i think. we may have been watching the same display on opposite sides of the atlantic. oh, i should add that these objects were really high up. at the level of stars it seemed. they moved at a somewhat normal speed. like airplanes, but definitely not airplanes. no blinking lights whatsoever. just whiteish star like objects that could be seen with the naked eye. this all took place between 10:30 and 11:00 p.M. normal air traffic was unusually light last night. one other oddity during the event was that the song birds, that are nesting right now, were chirping very softly. this is not usual for them. i live in the woods, and am surrounded by trees and all sorts of wildlife. i'm very familiar with their habits. anyway, there was nothing normal about what i saw last night. my son and i witnessed one of these on 5/9/10, but i dismissed it as a satelite. now i feel we may have seen more that night, but we went in to watch a movie. i really feel like those who are staying indoors at night are missing the greatest show on earth! i always knew it was'nt the circus. so long for now.
content.summary: To the witness in manchester england, i watched something similar last night.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
i would get home from work and my wife was working p/t at night as we had our first born whom was 2 or 3 yrs old at this time. 
  the date and time are not exact but i do remember it was that time of year when it would be getting dark earlier. i am guessing around sept/oct of 1992 or 1993.  
  my son and myself layed on the floor in front of the tv to watch a movie together while mom was at work. it was night time and dark. i am not sure how far into the movie it was but for some reason unknown to me i looked to my right out the front window. my line of sight was minimal and only in an upward angle above the row of conifers and below the eves of the house. i immediately saw 3 red lights either moving slowly down or moving slowly down and at a westward angle. in any event it was traveling where it would appear to go almost directly over my house or land in my front yard perhaps.  this did not look normal. it appeared to be huge but i really couldn't judge how far away it was however it was fairly close and not way up in the sky. 
 as i looked at it, flares came to mind but i rationalized there was no smoke, no flickering, not falling just steady red lights moving slowly.  i got up put my hands and face to the window as to eliminate any  glare or possible reflection in the window glass and confirming it wasn't flares.   then i asked my son (3 yrs old) if he see's this. he replied "yes".  there was what seems to be 30 feet between the tree tops and eves of the house from my angle so i know it was moving slowly. 
  i ran to the back window for what reason i don't know maybe to see if there was anything behind the house,then went back to the front window and it was still there.  i was getting a bit worried at this point and felt something wasn't right so i called my wife at work to the east and asked her if she could see anything in the sky towards our house.  she looked and said "no". so i hung up. i am still seeing this out the window and being my first born child i was feeling more protective than curious sensing something was not right. today i wish i would have went outside to get a better look (i think). 
 so at this point i called 911. with them on the phone i was still seeing this and only described it to them as "3 lights coming out of the sky"  i am sure some time has passed by now but i was reacting pretty fast so i can't judge the amount of time that had passed. it seemed i needed immediate response.
 the 911 operator asked me "what do you think it is" my reply was "ummm i dont know what it is" reluctant to say anything that may sound stupid.    actually ufo is not what came to mind while i was seeing this. i dont think the term ufo was a rational thought. i was just dumbfounded and in all reality i was preparing for fight or flight. not that it seemed threatening but i was highly protective of my son and this object's presence put some fear into me.
  
 to think about it, prior to this, ufo was something i would have laughed at if anyone told me the saw one, and if i had to describe one it would have been the typical disc flying saucer. i never heard anything or seen anything on tv that would have gave me this idea or description of a ufo.

 i was on the phone with 911 for awhile and was pacing the floor as the window wasn't that available with a corded phone. the operator repeatedly ask me what i think it is. i could not get anything out as to what i thought it was, only a "ummm i dont know what it is". during this time i was no longer watching out the window but rather pacing waiting for some answer's from 911 assuming they would do something. then the operator transfered me to someone whom i cannot recall. who also asked me what i think it is. all i could say is "ummm i dont know what it is". they took my name address and info. 
 the last thing i remember is sitting on the couch on the phone.  i have no idea what happened to the object where it went or what it was. the subject did not come up again and i cannot recall even remembering it the next day until some time had passed maybe 6-7 years when i was watching a show on tv one day and there was someone elses account described and shown exactly as i saw it. this was also when i realized the lights i saw were also a triangle shape and it did not alter from a triangle shape and it did appear dark within the triangle. it just did not register to me at the time that it was of importance to describe it as such. 
 there was no doubt in my mind after i saw it described, that is what the same thing i saw, identical. i can still visualize it to this day.
 it has been 16 years or so and it still goes through my mind almost everyday.  i only wish someone else would have seen it (my son at 17 said he remembers, but has no real reculection). and it leaves me wondering if it was explainable. on the other hand i cannot dismiss it. (it is a feeling that i know i saw it but noones going to beleive me without proof).
 i dont have a problem sharing this with friends or coworkers (if they exhibit open minds) and then only to find that they have stories to share also.  so that tells me this is bigger than i could imagine and that provides some comfort that i am not crazy.


a year or two prior to this i had another sighting with witnesses. two friends were at my previous home and for some reason unknown to me i walked out my front door looked straight up into the sky and very very high up there was a black triangle spinning in one spot. i pointed at it and asked my friends if they see it. they both saw it. i suppose it could have been a sattelite. it was a definent black triangle spinning fast,  and must have been huge because it was way up there. we dismissed it and didnt pay any more attention.

 just wanted to share this. i know its not possible to get confirmation on what i saw but it is good to know there are people who do listen.
content.summary: Saw big trinagle shape with red light at each corner

content.detailedDescription: I was at the aziscoos campground in milton mills, me at campsite #5, next to the bennet-bean covered bridge. just after sunset i was star gaizing the partial moon and gadging my silouette in the moon light. it was partly clowdy and i was watching the moon dissapear and reappear through the clouds and was spotting the emerging stars in the after twilight. i first had spotted some falling stars falling from the east just a little to the southern lattatude from me. it was then when i spotted what i first thought was a double star emerge above the horizon to the west. soon i learned that it was rising fast into the sky. as it grew closer i could see that there were more than two lights. when it was almost completely overhead i couled see more that two lights. actually there were two sets of lights; the forward set of lights were tightlr grouped of an unknown number that resembled an arrowhwead, and the rear set of lights were widly space apart in diamond formation it reminded me of the supersonic bomber "valkyrie." the most forward of the rear lights was strobing a yellowish light(that i estimated as the center of it's mass) while all of the others were shining a blueish white light. at first it was silent, but then as it grew closer there was the sound of a jet like engine. but it soundede quite distant as it flew by. when it passed, the aircraft was clearly the source of the rumbling noise. the craft flew from the west to the east at about 5000 ft. it gave me the impression of a delta wing aircraft( with the diamond formation of lighta) with a forward canard (as the arrowhead.) from it's height i wuold estimate it's size  as between a 707 and 747 by the spacing of it's lights. but i could not get an exact out line of the craft. i could only judge it size by the lights. it traveled from horizon to horizon below the clouds cover from the west and traveled due east over the rangley lakes region of me. it flew at a subsonic speed as it gave no sonic boom, but it was fast. this aircraft did not conform to any faa approved navagational lighting of red/blue - port/starboard arraingment. no marking were notised. i have live in boston, ma and in manchester nh, both of which have major airports. i have seen aircraftof all sizes and this one was like something i've never seen before.
content.summary: Low flying aircraft, sub sonic- but big.
